name: bacteriologist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a scientist who studies bacteria, especially those that cause disease: She is a physician and a bacteriologist working at a university laboratory. It is a bacterium that is difficult to work with, and bacteriologists have never been able to grow it successfully. See
bacteriology
More examplesFewer examplesThe centre brings together an interdisciplinary group of virologists, bacteriologists, epidemiologists, and clinicians.He was an observant and conscientious bacteriologist. Bacteriologists know that culturing bacteria is time-consuming and many bacteria do not thrive in the lab.
